item.title: 尼泊尔总理辞职，但抗议政府和腐败愤怒 - 美联社新闻

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚推出了非洲最大的水力发电大坝 - 路透社
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚推出了非洲最大的水电大坝＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters $ 45亿美元的大坝点燃了尼罗河的争执＆nbsp;＆nbsp; bloomberg 埃塞俄比亚向苦埃及反对派发射大量的水电大坝＆nbsp; cnn 死亡，美元，争议：埃塞俄比亚的Gerd Mega Dam ＆nbsp; dw 从Haile Selassie到众筹，埃塞俄比亚的Gerd大坝如何出生＆nbsp; nbsp; al Jazeera

item.title: 组织者声称，格雷塔·敦伯格（Greta Thunberg
item.description: Greta Thunberg的加沙弗洛蒂拉（Gaza Flotilla href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijafbvv95cuxpqwjyt2u4s18weulxt1ram0zasndstm1asle1asle1wwwtsbwwtsbwwtsbwlruzjfum1nznm4sss1nvw ppwtj3bllssflhvue5vlg4uzhjnlnxcs1mrkleynhwztbhslp6qxlmczvhmczvhm0fctwhmq2xycmz3ujjrnmz3ujjjrnmz3ujjjrnmzsmmlfsmmlfsmmlfsmmlfszj1atriununuxrhdqtxnaznaz？ target =“ _ blank”>加沙结合的舰队被突尼斯撞击，艾滋病小组说＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiiAFBVV95cUxPdURneGFiY0hqSlhVVjJEQnZSQ3FVRzkwM2RZUFRaUy1rZ2NWWFhFeTdwQ1Z dywr0wurasvrwbxa0ctjewxpfm1fwvlp0a1rlqkp1 efflvzveng1rczvru2ponxrbntlyejnbdexmmmhhwuxduqmlaz2dyoohn4wnlgvu9ox2fwdnjs？ target =“ _ blank”>加沙援助船上的船只说船在突尼斯港口被无人机撞＆nbsp; cnn 调查报道了对加沙式船队和新的乌克兰导弹的罢工 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiuwfbvv95cuxqu1qu1kyzgdiughpdxo5cunfctd6nkv1smgwowz1smgwowz1oezvntf3ns0 wt25ieduxnvzebhjtue14ogxvz01mrmxvbjhywlmyvdryanfnlun6efbmahdbrlvmwl9wb2piadznuwsxewsxewzoeg9um2l4s2l4s3vls3vls0rpc2vju 01uymfyz3fpy3bfz3njzkj4SMZ2NUFLM1K1WLIWUWQTQTQTDWBV9LQNBLBVFIYUDVM3N3N3UFFXEDRIVC1XLXLXLXLXFWYKPR0GFWYKPR0GFWWQVVWQVVFFFFFFFFEXFMUHRSVGPP OY2O1M3JZTM1XRMQ4UETXOGDNNJVXBMZXSHNIYLNVMUXMBELHDNHQR3JASK1NGJBMHF6ZGF6ZGFOB0NZSU8TOFUERXH5SGTKH5SGTKVTE0WNC？ target =“ _ blank”>加沙弗洛蒂拉（Gaza Flotilla）船被突尼斯攻击，组织者说＆nbsp; nbsp; nbc News

item.title: 法国的马克龙在政府崩溃后寻求新总理 - 路透社
item.description: 法国的马克龙在政府崩溃后寻求新总理＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters ＆nbsp; nbsp; npr 意见|法国对权衡取舍的抵制使另一位总理付出了他的工作＆nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 法国的政治危机加深了另一个下午的裁员：这是接下来发生的事情＆nbsp; cnbc

item.title: 以色列军事问题全面撤离命令，加沙市 - ABC新闻
item.description: 以色列军事问题全部加沙市的全疏散令href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijafbvv95cuxnvgtialrkd1dtmw5fnhbxwldjmf83cuutaey2ck5vyuv0vl9malpitddmovliak M0aFRwWmF4SjhyYldOWURTZXd2NmRDQS1jYkp2X3pXdTlXSzlrS3YxRHlqMXdiX2xlTXp3MlFySHdZLVhCUnBjWHA1M0RzSnRXcUpSdzlOdGVlclhzYQ?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>以色列订单总撤离加沙市，威胁全部入侵＆nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmilwfbvv95cuxnwwwgzxx0kxczczzczzd2rgvvlvezu1aydwjmylhhenveny0cu5ddewdewdewdewdl3dl3dlhxdumm umm href = href = FgtdXd1SEExeXFXMzNrZ1ZJUlFhY3hWdWpUbEM1bHgzcFMzWWpYeUZHWFo0Z3BrSFlpZDVsTEl2MlBzNXdSZ1ZvVkFoUmNRYW51YkJ1VWdVR2djU1NlX2xKXzZV?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>以色列命令对加沙城的完全撤离，因为内塔尼亚胡警告‘这只是开始'＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 内塔尼亚胡（Netanyahu href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmitwfbvv95cuxorhdxnxz6lwdqsetw A2VRR1DQSKJAU1VVUHJKY28WUNMXRGPYU18WSWTMM0R1VNLNBDDLOW1MUHZOT01JY1JY1JY1JY1JY1JY19ZBKPKPKPKPKPKPKPKPKPKPKKVUJ tte13djdjdorjlqc3zcemndmedhanv3tdlfbvozs1e3ctbywmlldehceuetennnenn5nkziwm9ltfrka0 hiudjtqja2q1dws3jpdmewmuntouvktjvfa3e3e3bjsczb6mg92zks5cdjdte1ky05htgm？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>以色列警告如果哈马斯不投降＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS

item.title: 绘制俄罗斯无人机和导弹袭击的过去一年 - 半岛电视台
item.description: 政治信号俄罗斯在乌克兰的每一个巨大弹幕＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报 几乎每晚几乎每天晚上都炸弹乌克兰。这就是听起来的样子。＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 俄罗斯以最大的战争袭击击中乌克兰，使政府建造Ablaze ＆nbsp; REUTERS href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiv0fvx3lxte1rcxkwsxkwsxlvvudkdmrvzexjm2xqlt mzc3oybkz0bu1xdzdks0jreeutvhnunvzfy3dsouldqlvtr0vtr0vwwwln2ttttttfjcwtun09hanpswgjozvdoaw？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>简短的世界新闻：联合国首席谴责俄罗斯对乌克兰的袭击，加沙危机仍在继续，保护刚果博士的平民＆nbsp;＆nbsp; <font color =“＃6f6f6f”

item.title: 泰国法院命令前总理塔克辛（Thaksin）入狱一年 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: 泰国法院命令前主持人塔克辛（Thaksin href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiyafbvv95cuxqtvzvvffzvfzta1hen0pftlj1t 0I2VMHLCGZZMEF6B1PBUES5U1Q5AMLOOHLNY3LIATJOAGO5QNY1YJBQZVCYQVKXNFFVAERQNFFVAERQNJJJVATHVNW phahbmvllmvv9havdgQ3ZQS1H2YLFESMVGRW1EDERPNM1HMEHURDZKVZFUBDNIZW5WBHNVCGS3U21 NZU9XAULNAHL5SKVXM3VPB3P2CJFVZ0TVLWO0SVDYSKRUD1I3NKDRULNKHXUXZPODRCNNVOTA？ target =“ _ blank”> thai ex-pm thaksin shinawatra被判入狱，因为法院规则医院保持不公正＆nbsp; REUTERS href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbminafbvv95cuxnvjdwywywtnq1luy0jjz2vunrbbtjitxpgmrom0xpgqmrom0xum5 kVGc21icnFzSEdRYk1NeUFoZjJLR3pfZ3VINldjTV9FU3BNaUZGZDNPUmpDLVV4YTdDaWxCT25ackhfV2xZaXhfdU5pZTMzeHEyM21OMFNJYmN1ZmxoQTdEMDViS2E?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”> thaksin shinawatra：前领导人在法庭裁决前几天离开私人飞机离开泰国，这可能会使他入狱＆nbsp; nbsp; 6f6f6f“> cnn> cnn 前PM Thaksin在法院裁决之前返回泰国，这可能导致监禁＆nbsp; nbsp; ap ap news> ap news

item.title: Prabowo Subianto解雇财政部长 - 《金融时报》之后，印尼市场发动了
item.description: 印尼市场在Prabowo Subianto开除财政部长＆nbsp; Financial Times 印度尼西亚财政部长的撤职揭露了投资者，Rupiah沉没了＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS 印度尼西亚的明星财政部长跌至地球＆nbsp;＆nbsp; bloomberg 印度尼西亚总统Prabowo Subianto在发生抗议活动后解雇了财政部长＆nbsp; nbsp; Financial Times

item.title: 麦利的“老板”在阿根廷残酷损失后成为责任 - 彭博
item.description: 麦莉的'boss'在阿根廷残酷损失＆nbsp; nbsp; bloomberg 阿根廷总统麦莉（Milei href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmitgfbvv95cuxodwe2qmdhru5kttb ymgnvuljlov9lcvlpmvpjtupaalhiwxl2dhdlz2jsak1mrkvoqmvmyjrqmvmyjrqwlbzdlgzckck5quxgwmz M4EVZTQWU4Z1PUDJRLSW5UDUXXYVLRQWV3AVZ4QMFQM3P1ALJAV1ALJAV19REM9WVJBDAU4TBMLQM25VN KJ5Q0J4M2HFDFDPDJZ2TGZYTM5JMTBMSNFIQLZGNES0YUJPC3HZSG5SB3RUCXZWV1ZJZJZW？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的触发器显示了危机的速度，使麦利（Milei href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmigwfbvv95cuxnt3c5udv6zjlndhv3wnfozzjbyktrwmg1m3fwsuyzssuyzssslltutxehllw My1ZB0JOV2JZT0S4Q2CZRWXWNGZLAW44DZRCRVBYELJGX3B2MLRBWMT3ZTJMU0XOEGVEZU1PMKKKK0WFNQA0QA0QA0Q3B0Q3B0Q3B0Y0Y0Y0B0B1YK0B1Y4TMZBXBX1LPETNMSQ？ Target =“ _ Blank”>阿根廷人向麦利的丑闻摇滚政府付出选举打击＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmif0fvx3lxte13mhhvwm1gc0tpofz1v00xeen6rfetc3hxu1gymfvfvfuthymfvuthymfvuthysfuthysfo3nktky vrlvxbfbznvz0rcmwfsvzvnmelvwjlctuo1wllbv1rkr1rkr1rsdjnpdezmzg5cqwi1pz1pz1lqtwi1lqt222221lqt21rywdjaqxfrdmnvfrdmnvtextex4vtex4cjjjjjjjjjjjjjj5ufhwoelvbgc？oc = 5' target =“ _ blank”>意见| Milei的实验可能正在失去Steam ＆nbsp; 《华尔街日报》

item.title: 货运列车猛撞墨西哥城外的一辆公共汽车，杀死至少10人-PBS
item.description: 货运火车猛撞墨西哥城外的一辆公共汽车，至少杀死10人＆nbsp; nbsp; pbs 十人丧生，墨西哥火车撞到双层公共汽车后有61人受伤＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirgFBVV95cUxQNldFWWR5MTN2YVZNLWdFYXY1XzJXQmpPZ0hDSVlwbG5YY2V2SnRSdERJR2g5RjFBRWNCRHB2Q2 U3TlFQbVZyRE5zWGNUQTBHT0xfbE1JdGw2aGFhTmhNN1g4SFpTdGZaQm1hU2VHR1R5VDRvS0UxTUVQeDYwbURpeDA3UkZZU0NjdmxWZExQSGdsb050N1FQdkt2bjBfMWdiLUt uaTI2WGhCNmM0ZnfSAbMBQVVfeXFMTTVpZnhlaTN5R1lFRVhVbDNqSGs1M0lWQnNtMUkxV0dsWWFHNER5U0ZlRE9wZmhjZHFQb1NjWWx4c3p6OHpPemJab2llbG1Ra0lYM1h3 c3pisdjrajhdoetuzepzb0hqs0mxu1n4ata0y1phlvqxnk9awe1vejl5a0dxmnhqyzmnhqyzmnnnnnnkuhforlpjnmnkuhforlpjnmhforlpjnm5rd0netw02rjdwwzrjdwwz3rjrjrjrqnz3rj11 = 5 target =“ _ blank”>工人的日常通勤到墨西哥城，在致命的火车碰撞中以悲剧结束＆nbsp; abc news 墨西哥崩溃：火车撞到公共汽车＆nbsp; bbc 火车在墨西哥与双层巴士碰撞，杀死至少10人＆nbsp;＆nbsp; cnn

item.title: 工党赢得挪威选举-Politico.eu
item.description: 工党赢得挪威选举＆nbsp;＆nbsp; politico.eu 挪威统治工党赢得连任，而民粹主义者得分获得＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMitAFBVV95cUxOelB3U3VJUXpBaTV4TzhNWU4xVjRMY0NCeWM5eXo2QWlCdE93ZEdudkxlcG5oVndEZUZoVWpQRUFsVlZvMWk1QzB5O wlwtejgtjy0bww3s29sqnvxtvhty2dwzujus1hln1vpqmlmlmu3fuag15cdvjsxd4lvvmcnzwu3p gmxjhchbhazjkd2m4bwlpbzhecla0qu5mvhrtmjfzvndudvjxutvjxutvqzlnhwfhyovbbvvy？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>挪威的总理在绿色添加座位时迅速持续到化石燃料＆nbsp; nbsp; bloomberg 挪威的左争夺投票获胜，民粹主义者右派进入第二名href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmi0afbvv95cuxndw5pnkjaze9umdvjjowlhzwq5 T3N2CDA5SKJTZGVISM4YM1ZMC0PVCNJPB1P2SLVUDVQ4NEXVDJVDJVDJVZUW5ZMXE4VNC1QZV1QZV1U3RVCUHPN3K3X25 ldlrounostrkbxbsunl2tvb3zmc4bfawmwhmwhwoujgahjkrvpwy084zm84n29pmw95sgpnlwnjdelemndiem J6TJHOY1RXB2I0R1BTM3C0NTJPVE1YAG1VLXVQRUJQZ05QENH3LU5VQKKNWSNZYUWT3ZKZXCCUF3MLRK？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>发生时：挪威选举的结果'非常接近'，但领先优势 - 专家 ＆nbsp; 守护者

item.title: 金砖国家国家开会与美国贸易保护主义反击-Semafor

item.title: 澳大利亚妇女因用蘑菇中毒亲戚而被判处无期徒刑-NPR
item.description: 澳大利亚妇女因用蘑菇中毒亲戚而被判处无期徒刑＆nbsp; nbsp; npr 现在艾琳·帕特森（Erin Patterson）在哪里？在她的生活中2年杀死3人有毒蘑菇＆nbsp; people.com 澳大利亚蘑菇谋杀幸存者伊恩·威尔金森（Ian Wilkinson）对私人的私下恳求，因为艾琳·帕特森（Erin Patterson）被判入狱＆nbsp; nbsp; 6f6f6f“> bbc” href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwwfbvv95cuxpnk1oemjsyjuxreyyrfm2 wjb5vk1yyytryotrqstu4zkxwql9lrk1vlrcndhnrg5yaw1hwnfywhq1rk9rdnnnn3dhrpatrqmvhim1j McKXFOTZSTFFVMDR0S2VUWGLJBJDVCWZCTFL5YTBND3RYUUUUZWTRFRXDRFRXDYQTRRDEDQBUMYS081QXVAWE XTMGTMBNHCNTBFQ0TAZ2VHNU9ICZV2ADLYM0JET1R6EKTNNHHKU0P2DZHYVHFSHFSTNNMCM1GOXM？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>澳大利亚蘑菇凶手艾琳·帕特森（Erin Patterson）至少被判入狱33年＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters nino bucci在艾琳·帕特森（Erin Patterson）的句子上 - 全文播客＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者
